data.comment: The match has started at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel.
At Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel, Jeffry Fortes has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 32, Marco Rente (Almelo) has received a yellow card from Serdar Gozubuyuk.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 47, Sparta take a 1-0 lead thanks to Abdou Harroui.
Orestis Kiomourtzoglou (Almelo) gets a yellow card.
Sparta are down to 10 men after Adil Auassar has been shown a red card.
In the minute 59, Frank Wormuth is making the team's first substitution at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel with Teun Bijleveld replacing Lucas Schoofs.
Sparta make their first substitution with Sven Mijnans replacing Mario Engels.
Almelo's Rai Vloet has been booked in Rotterdam.
In the minute 74, The away team replace Orestis Kiomourtzoglou with Delano Burgzorg.
Kasper Lunding is on a sub for Silvester Van der Water for Almelo.
Rai Vloet is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 75, Kasper Lunding instrumental with a fine assist.
Deroy Duarte (Sparta) has received a first yellow card.
The home team have replaced Deroy Duarte with Aaron Meijers. This is the second substitution made today by Henk Fraser.
In the minute 81, Emanuel Emegha is replacing Lennart Thy for the home team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
